description: MeMe Live is a real live streaming platform to make friends and show talent. It allows you to live stream your special moments, live talk and make video calls with your friends.  Join MeMe Family Now! Sharing funny moments with over 5 million MeMers, To be an ideal Idol through broadcast your life, gain fans, receive gifts and earn money . MeMe is the best social community platform to live up.  Watch Live Streaming - Whenever you open up MeMe Live, there are always talented and pretty handsome people are waiting to chat with you. - Millions of talented broadcasters, passionate dancers and singers, big eaters, comedians, etc. present you amazing live streams and live videos.  Go live to share your lifestyle, -Join the activities to win the prize - Singing, dancing, playing the instrument, magic, comedy, ... Just 1 tap to go live! - Show your talents, get more followers, receive many gifts, earn money and be an idol easily.  Free Live Video Chat & Video Call - Invite friend to start 1:1 online video chat. - Create room to start voice chat with friends in Multi-Call Room. - Use video filters or stickers while video chatting to have fun.  Multi Call ChatRoom - Live talk with pretty girls or handsome boys from all India, - Live voice chat with voice emoji to have fun. - Here you can talk about life and learn foreign languages with your new friends.  Beauty Effect The advanced beauty filters attached, beauty effect will be applied automatically when you go live streaming and video chatting,  PK Live House Join PK live House to challenge host from different place and win the prize. Try PK challenge and have fun with your friends on MeMe LIVE! Broadcasters who get more attraction points will win the PK while losers have to receive punishments.  Join MeMe live to be the host of your life.  Contact: memeliveindiabd@nextentertain.com Official Facebook Fans Page: https://www.facebook.com/memeliveindia
